Class UIManager

java.lang.Object
parade.helpers.ui.UIManager
public class UIManager extends Object
UIManager acts as a controller for user interface-related operations, delegating rendering tasks to DisplayFactory while managing flow and formatting.

    • printFormattedTurnDisplay

      public static void printFormattedTurnDisplay(Player currentPlayer, ParadeBoard paradeBoard, int selectedIndex, String[] actionOptions, boolean onCardRow)
      Displays the player's turn with a focus on a selected card.
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - The player taking the turn
      paradeBoard - The game board state
      selectedIndex - The card index being hovered or chosen
      actionOptions - Available actions
      onCardRow - Whether the selection is on the card row

    • printFormattedTurnDisplay

      public static void printFormattedTurnDisplay(Player currentPlayer, ParadeBoard paradeBoard, String[] actionOptions)
      Displays the player's turn when no specific card is selected.
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - The player taking the turn
      paradeBoard - The current parade board state
      actionOptions - Available actions

      deckEmpty - Whether the final round was triggered by the deck running out

      public static void displayCardPlay(Player player, Card chosenCard, ParadeBoard paradeBoard, PlayerBoard playerBoard, ArrayList<Card> removedCards)
      Displays the action of a player playing a card and the resulting board changes.
      Parameters:
      player - The player who played the card
      chosenCard - The card played
      paradeBoard - The parade board after the move
      playerBoard - The player's personal board after the move
      removedCards - Any cards removed due to the play
